text: Jiaruo wo jiang shi yi bu waiguoyu de “gulanjing”, tamen biding hui shuo:“Zenme bu jieshi qizhong de jie wen ne? Yi bu waiguoyu de jingdian he yige alabo de xianzhi ma?” Ni shuo:“Ta shi xindao zhe de xiangdao he yaofang; buxindao zhe ting'erbuwen, shi'erbujian, yinwei zhexie ren shi cong yuan chu bei hanjiao de.”
